explanation: In a rotated sorted array, the minimum is at the rotation point. Compare nums[mid] with nums[right]: if nums[mid] > nums[right], the minimum must be in the right half (after mid). Otherwise, it's at mid or in the left half. Keep narrowing until left == right, which points to the minimum. Time: O(log n), Space: O(1).
